DOC.brief_summary: The main goal study evaluate effect tap postural control dynamic exercise . 30 subject Chronic ankle instability ( CAI ) include study . Several questionnaire regard anthropometric data , medical history , activity level functional status fill participant . Postural control measure use force plate optoelectronic system capture lower limb kinematics . Subjects ask perform forward hop , sideward hop vertical drop , maintain balance 10 second land . 5 good trial movement capture . Subjects CAI perform exercise without tape . Hypothesis subject CAI tape enhance postural control .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Taping Postural Control Subjects With Chronic Ankle Instability
DOC.criteria: history least one ankle sprain result pain , swell stiffness , prohibit participation sport , recreational activity least 3 week repeat ankle sprain presence give way feel weakness around ankle decrease functional participation ( recreational , competitive professionally )
